article: I was never a starter for my high school football team.No matter how _ I practiced I was always on the second string.A few of us backups even _ called ourselves the _ boys and gave each other nicknames.Mine was "Splinter ." During one of the last games of the year, _ there came a point when I finally _ it onto the field with the starters.It was my _ chance and I was determined to _ myself.It wasn't long either before the ball unexpectedly _ its way into my hands.I saw the end zone and turned to _ down the field for a touchdown .It was my shining moment and it _ so good.It lasted for about one second.That was when an _ player crashed into my back.It was Splinter's first and last shining moment before _ back to the bench. Since that time I have had a lot of shining moments in my life, _ most of them probably didn't look that _ in the eyes of the world.But I have come to see life from a _ viewpoint.When I open a _ for someone,share a smile with a _ ,and laugh with my children then I know that I am glowing bright.When I stop to help another,pass on a _ word,and do a loving act then I know that I am _ .I have come to learn too that it is these shining moments that make up our lives here.
